full_threads.body:
Hi Renee,

Confirming we have updated the site.

  1. Number and email has been updated
  2. https://bespokechildcare.com.au/contact/ redirects to https://littlescribblers.com.au/enquire/
  3. Home Text has been added as well. https://bespokechildcare.com.au/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thank you for your assistance with the Bespoke website. I can see that it's now live, which is great! However, I noticed there's no link directing visitors back to Little Scribblers.

Could we please make the following updates:

1. Change the phone number to 1300 300 011 and the email to enrol@littlescribblers.com.au.

2. On the Contacts page, could we redirect it to the Little Scribblers enquiry page instead? Also, could we remove the mobile number from this page?

Additionally, would it be possible to add a note to the front page, such as "Bespoke is proud to now be part of Little Scribblers" or something similar?

I'm sure you'll have a great way of wording it or do you have a better way of letting new families know that it is now little scribblers, we are open to suggestions.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Heath,

Thanks for clarifying! As long as Jackie is across the hosting and website billing side of things, that's all good.

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine,

Billing is for the website and hosting side of things. We are not in control of the domain though obviously. I have previously spoken with Jackie about the hosting, but happy to clarify as needed.

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the update! That's great to hear, and I can now see the site back up again. 😊

Just to confirm, when you mention the billing setup, is this specifically for the domain name, hosting, and site-related services? Please let me know if there's anything I need to flag with Jackie or address on my end.

Appreciate your help as always!

Best regards,
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Awesome thanks Madeleine,

Confirming the site is now live on our servers :)

We have also set up the billing etc for Jackie.

Let me know if you need anything else?

Hi Heath

Thanks for sending this over, Site & Stores has let me know this should now be updated.

Thanks!
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine,

Yes, if they can please add these records:

CNAME record
Name/host: _acme-challenge
Domain name: bespokechildcare.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

CNAME record
Name/host: @
Domain name: bespokechildcare.hosting.kinsta.cloud

CNAME record
Name/host: www
Domain name: bespokechildcare.hosting.kinsta.cloud

PLEASE NOTE: you will need to remove the existing A Records and any records that reference wpengine. Please provide a screenshot of all records once the updates have been made.

Please let me know once they have made these changes and I will verify at my end.

Hi Heath

Thanks for chasing this up. I have been contacted by sites and stores today and they can action a redirect of the domain name, they just require our A record? Let me know if this is something you can help me with!

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Renee,

Happy New Year. I'm back as of today.

I have previously taken a copy of the website here:
https://bespokechildcare.kinsta.cloud/, so we are ok on that front.

All we need is access to the domain name. Have you managed to secure that as yet? Once I have it, I can make the website live again. Let me know?
Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

Thank you

Hi Heath,

I hope this email finds you well.

It seems there may have been some miscommunication regarding the website. I spoke with Lorraine this morning, and she mentioned that she had been informed by Jackie and Emad that they did not want the website. However, after discussing it with Jackie and Emad, they clarified that the plan was to transfer everything, and you were going to liaise with whoever Lorraine was using.

Unfortunately, the bespoke website has since been closed. Is there a way to resolve this situation?

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Thank you I will follow up again tomorrow 😊

Hi Renee,

I have just nudged Lorraine on the original email thread and cc'd you in. Any pushing you can do from your end would be amazing.
